    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Description copied from interface: ItemFactory
        Dispose the factory

        All items that where created by this factory and where not disposed up to now are being disposed

        After a call to this method it is not possible to create new items. Multiple calls to ItemFactory.dispose() or calls to ItemFactory.disposeAllItems() are possible.

        Specified by:
        dispose in interface ItemFactory
        Overrides:
        dispose in class CommonItemFactory

      • disposeItem

        public void disposeItem(DataItem item)
        Description copied from interface: ItemFactory
        Dispose an item if it was created by this factory

        If the item was not created by this factory or was already disposed this is no error and no exception is thrown

        Specified by:
        disposeItem in interface ItemFactory
        Overrides:
        disposeItem in class HiveItemFactory
        Parameters:
        item - data item to dispose
